productTypes.name: Inclusive
productTypes.description: Products that are inclusive of all additional features and services.

productTypes.name: Exclusive
productTypes.description: Products that are exclusive and typically offer premium features or services.

productTypes.name: Digital
productTypes.description: Products that are digital in nature, such as software, e-books, and online services.

productTypes.name: Service
productTypes.description: Products that are offered as a service, including consultancy, maintenance, and support.

productTypes.name: Physical
productTypes.description: Tangible products that can be physically handled and used.

productTypes.name: Subscription
productTypes.description: Products that are provided on a subscription basis, offering recurring access or delivery.

productTypes.name: One-time Purchase
productTypes.description: Products that are purchased once and do not have recurring payments.

productTypes.name: Freemium
productTypes.description: Products that offer basic features for free with the option to pay for advanced features.

productTypes.name: Trial
productTypes.description: Products that are offered for a limited time for evaluation purposes.

productTypes.name: Open Source
productTypes.description: Products that are released with a license allowing anyone to view, modify, and distribute the source code.

productTypes.name: Enterprise
productTypes.description: Products designed for business use, often including additional features and support.

productTypes.name: Educational
productTypes.description: Products designed for educational purposes, often including special pricing for students and teachers.

productTypes.name: Customizable
productTypes.description: Products that can be tailored to the specific needs of the user.

productTypes.name: Licensing
productTypes.description: Products sold under a licensing agreement, often involving periodic payments.
